description: This Dart file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, implementing a discovery-style home page featuring a parallax hero header, sticky search bar, segmented tabs, and horizontally scrolling discovery carousels with category filters.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that implements a discovery-style homepage with parallax hero header, search, segmented tabs, and discovery carousels.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing controllers, filters, and building the UI components.

classes.name: _StickyHeaderDelegate
classes.description: A sliver delegate that creates a pinned sticky header with a child widget.

classes.name: _ParallaxHeroHeaderDelegate
classes.description: A sliver delegate that creates a parallax effect header with background gradient and branding text.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes tab controller and page controllers.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _goSearch
methods.description: Handles search submission, navigating to listing page with optional category filter.

methods.name: _filterCategory
methods.description: Filters a list of books based on the selected category.

methods.name: _trending
methods.description: Generates a list of trending books, shuffled pseudo-randomly for variation.

methods.name: _forYou
methods.description: Builds a personalized books list by interleaving categories.

methods.name: _topRated
methods.description: Lists books sorted by rating, descending.

methods.name: _tabContent
methods.description: Builds the content for each tab, including category chips and a horizontal carousel of books.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product details page for a selected book.
